about.text: Capital One is all about giving back. We did this and that, and now we are offering open source code to the world. It is just a small part of our awesomeness. So suck it.

more-about.header: Why do we still do this?
more-about.text: Like I said, Capital One is all about giving back. We did this and that, and now we are offering open source code to the world. It is just a small part of our awesomeness. So suck it.
